DOC.brief_title: HDR v LDR Brachytherapy Monotherapy Treatment Localized Prostate Cancer .
DOC.detailed_description: Permanent implant prostate brachytherapy ( LDRPBT ) well establish prove method treatment patient low select intermediate risk , organ confine prostate cancer . There number study high-dose rate brachytherapy ( HDRPBT ) monotherapy several fractionation schedule treat group patient . One phase II trial show effectiveness give one fraction 19 Gy . In trial investigator randomly select patient treat either LDR prostate brachytherapy ( 145Gy ) HDR prostate brachytherapy ( 1x19Gy ) monotherapy . Patients stratify two pretreatment group : 1. low risk , 2. select intermediate risk group . Brachytherapy give spinal anaesthesia , use transrectal ultrasound base real time treatment planning . Dose constraint define method .
